keywords: ['latin dance', 'male vocal', 'rising pattern', 'accordeon', 'bass guitar', 'electronic drums', 'people shouting', 'energetic', 'vibrant', 'loud']
caption: This is the recording of a latin dance music piece. It has a male vocalist singing the same word repeatedly at a medium-to-high pitch. There is an accordion playing the melody and a bass guitar in the background. The electronic drums play a latin beat for the rhythm. There is a constant rising and accelerating pattern in the piece. The sound of people shouting can be heard in the recording. The atmosphere is very loud and vibrant.
